---
name: "Feature Request"
about: Propose a new feature or improvement
title: "feat: <short title>"
labels: ["feature"]
assignees: []
---

## Goal
Describe the user value and success criteria.

## Scope
In/Out of scope, affected modules (backend `ecm-core/`, frontend `ecm-frontend/`).

## Design Outline
Key design points, data model/API changes, dependencies.

## Risks & Rollback
Operational risks, fallback plan, data migration notes.

## Test Plan
Unit/Integration/E2E, performance targets.

## Tasks
- [ ] Implementation
- [ ] Tests
- [ ] Docs/config updates
